Rendering Galaxies in R

Random galaxies, black holes and star constellations

David Schoch

2020-03-04

Render galaxies, Blackholes and Star constellations in R

This was a project of mine in 2020 when I had an ambition to get into generative art. I abandoned that idea after this project because it just took too much time (and I lost motivation again…) I decided to release the code behind the project for everyone to play around with (see link above). You can do whatever you want with it. Problem is that I neither documented the code nor my resources. So it may take some time and effort to understand what is going on.
